title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1401.9 - Public notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1401.9 - Public notice

State Regulations

Each agency shall publicize by posting in a conspicuous
location and/or by publication in a local newspaper of general
circulation: (a) The locations where
records shall be made available for inspection and copying. (b) The name, title, business address and
business telephone number of the designated records access officers. (c) The right to appeal by any person denied
access to a record and the name and business address of the person or body to
whom an appeal is to be directed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1401.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
